2020 Ferrari 488 Pista Grigio Titanio Metall FQ on Alcantara Charcoal

ATPM
KM 1,600 an

Exterior Color : Grigio Titanio Metall FQ 3233
Interior Color : Alcantara Charcoal 7452
Mats : Extra-Range

Adaptive Frontlight System
Red Brake Callipers
Carbon Fibre Front Flaps
Carbon Fibre Side Air Splitter
Engine Covers in Carbon Fibre
Rear Diffuser in Carbon Fibre
Front Air Vents in Carbon Fibre
Carbon Fibre Underdoor Cover
Carbon Fibre Inner Sill Trim
Coloured Inner Details – Rosso Ferrari 130421 Leather
Alcantara Centre Console – Alcantara Nero 9440
Alcantara Dashboard – Alcantara Nero 9440
Suspension Lifter
Cavallino Stitched on Headrest – Rosso 0504
Titanium Exhaust Pipes

Carbon Fibre Rear Moulding
High Emotion Low Emission
Metric System Instruments
‘Scuderia Ferrari’ Shields
Int/Ext Electrochromic Mirrors
Radionavi System + Bluetooth
Parking Camera
20″ Dark Forged Wheels
Yellow Rev. Counter
Carbon Fibre Racing Seats – Medium Size Seats
High Power HI-FI System
Coloured Special Stitching O.R. – Rosso 0504
Upper Part of Passenger Compartment in Alcantara – Alcantara Nero 9440
Spare Wheel Kit 20″
